description: Observations on a proposed development within the adjoining Borough of Wandsworth with respect to Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) pursuant to planning permission dated 20/12/2019 ref 2019/4352 (Alterations and extensions, including the erection of a dormer extension to the main rear roof slope and the addition of two sky lights to the front roof slope to provide an additional third floor of accommodation. Demolition of rear extension including nonoriginal rear additions at ground and first floor level and construction of a two-storey rear extension with mansard roof.) to allow the creation of a terrace with glazed surround above the roof of the back addition to serve Flat D at 53 Clapham Common North Side SW4 9RX.
